header.description: Entrepreneurs of the Amazon: Building Sustainable and Creative Technologies for the Women's Movement in the Islands of Belém do Pará - Brazil

curiosity.mmib: MMIB promotes ecotourism on Cotijuba Island and carries out projects that serve the entire community, from the young to the elderly, in addition to fostering teamwork, female empowerment, and bio-entrepreneurship.
curiosity.compamostra: Computação Amostra, the largest technology event of Cesupa Institution, is recognized by ABSTARTUPS and GOOGLE for STARTUPS as a prominent event in the entrepreneurial culture of the North.
curiosity.sthem: Cesupa aims to implement an entrepreneurial and innovative culture in the daily lives of university students. The STHEM Consortium is a major partner of CESUPA in training teachers in active methodologies, and since the partnership, there has been a strengthening of game-based learning, with the creation of Hackathons and innovation marathons, as well as Project-Based Learning (PBL).

about.objective1: Promote technological and entrepreneurial solutions in the Amazon.
about.objective2: Strengthening the innovation ecosystem and networking.
about.objective3: Interrelationship between students and technology companies in the market.
about.objective4: Creating immersive experiences in islands and communities for students.

program.title: The Program
program.description3: is an educational program for students of Computer Science and Computer Engineering courses at CESUPA. It aims to connect companies committed to Amazonian sustainability, the local community with its traditional knowledge, and scientific and technological knowledge for the bioeconomic development of the region.

header.description: UmaOs universitários elaboram projetos sustentáveis para a Ilha de Cotijuba e sua comunidade, aliando-se ao MMIB, uma instituição sem fins lucrativos que busca firmar a autonomia e o conhecimento cidadão.
